section.name: Maven Cactus plugin
section.p: This is a plugin for Maven that allows to easily perform Cactus unit-testing with Maven. See the features list for more details.

tr.td:
Maven plugin 1.6.1 for Cactus is available. See the changes report for the detailed list of changes. To install it, run:
maven plugin:download -DartifactId=cactus-maven -DgroupId=cactus -Dversion=1.6.1
Read the using guide for more details on installation and usage.
Maven plugin 1.6 for Cactus is available.

section.name: Documentation roadmap
section.p: Check the features page for all features of this plugin.
